title: Navigation — Remove Profile Extract and Viral Library
description: Completely remove Profile Extract and Viral Library pages, routes, and sidebar navigation entries. Ensure no broken links or workflow dependencies.
acceptanceCriteria: Profile Extract page and route deleted
Viral Library page and route deleted
No broken links anywhere in the app
No other workflows broken by removal

steps.details: Delete app/admin/moodboard/profile/ directory and all contents. Remove any route references.
Delete app/admin/viral-library/ directory (or wherever it lives) and all contents. Remove any route references.
In the admin sidebar component, remove the nav items for Profile Extract and Viral Library. Clean up any associated imports.
Grep the codebase for 'profile-extract', 'viral-library', 'profile/extract', or related route paths. Remove or update any remaining references (links, redirects, etc.).

steps.description: Clean up unused components and API routes
steps.details: If there are API routes exclusively used by these pages (e.g., /api/moodboard/profile), consider removing them. Remove unused component imports.

technicalNotes: Profile Extract was already partially disabled (had a DEPRECATED early return that was recently re-enabled)
Check if /api/moodboard/profile route is used by anything else before removing
Viral Library may have components shared with other features — check before deleting
